title: Create Chatwoot teams for department routing
description: Set up Chatwoot teams: Sales Team, Support Team, Billing Team, Supervisors. Assign agents to appropriate teams. Configure auto-assignment rules per inbox.

title: Register WhatsApp Business numbers with API
description: Register each department WhatsApp number with WhatsApp Business API. Numbers TBD: Sales, Support, Billing (approx 3 numbers). Each number needs phone verification and webhook configuration.

title: Set up Meta Business Account for WhatsApp API
description: Create and configure Meta Business Account to manage multiple WhatsApp Business numbers. Prerequisites: Facebook Business account, business verification documents.

title: Configure n8n webhook routing for multi-number support
description: Update WhatsApp Lead Capture workflow to handle multiple numbers. Route based on display_phone_number field. Tag conversations by department. Customize AI responses per department context.

title: Configure n8n PostgreSQL credentials
description: Create PostgreSQL credential in n8n. COMPLETED - Credential configured via UI.
close_reason: PostgreSQL credential configured via n8n UI

title: Configure WhatsApp Business API integration
description: SUPERSEDED: This issue has been broken down into multiple issues for multi-WhatsApp number support. See: netsurf-automation-48v (Meta Business), netsurf-automation-3zo (Register numbers), netsurf-automation-ubr (Chatwoot inboxes), netsurf-automation-4mq (n8n routing), netsurf-automation-33g (Teams setup)

title: Set up Directus collections for business content
description: Create Directus collections: Products (name, sku, category, description, price), FAQ, Canned Responses, Business Hours, Promotions
close_reason: Created 5 collections (products, faq, canned_responses, business_hours, promotions), seeded sample data, configured public API access

title: Import and activate n8n workflows
description: Import pre-built workflows: WhatsApp Lead Capture, Booking Confirmation, Chatwoot Ticket Handler, MCP Tools Server, Daily Business Report. STATUS: All workflows imported and active. Waiting on external webhook access.
close_reason: All 5 workflows imported and active. Credentials configured. Waiting on WhatsApp Business API for external webhook testing.

title: Configure n8n PostgreSQL credentials
description: Create PostgreSQL credential in n8n. COMPLETED - Credential configured via UI.

title: Configure Chatwoot inboxes for each WhatsApp number
description: Create separate Chatwoot inbox for each WhatsApp number. Configure team assignments: Sales inbox -> Sales team, Support inbox -> Support team, Billing inbox -> Shared pool. Set up supervisor access to all inboxes.
